dqcnac.compiler.local_manager module

Local compilation manager module.

class dqcnac.compiler.local_manager.LocalManager(distributed_circuit: DAGCircuit, network: Network, partitions: dict[Qubit, int], mapper: str = 'dense', router: str = 'basic')[source]

Bases: object

A class to manage local mapping and routing.

__init__(distributed_circuit: DAGCircuit, network: Network, partitions: dict[Qubit, int], mapper: str = 'dense', router: str = 'basic')[source]

Initialize the local manager

Parameters:

  • distributed_circuit – an already distributed circuit

  • network – the network over which the circuit has been distributed

  • partitions – a mapping from qubits to network nodes ids

  • mapper – the local mapper to be used

  • router – the local router to be used

static add_edge(coupling_map: CouplingMap, src: int, dst: int, weight: float) → None[source]

Add a directed weighted edge to the coupling_map between src and dst

Parameters:

  • coupling_map – a coupling map

  • src – the source node

  • dst – the destination node

  • weight – the weight of the edge

run() → tuple[DAGCircuit, dict[int, Qubit], dict[int, tuple[str, int]], dict][source]

Run the local manager

Returns: the compiled circuit, a mapping from the network physical qubits and circuit virtual qubits, a mapping from network physical qubits to physical qubits of each node coupling map
